title.rendered: Mark Van Drunen Featured in Financial Advisor Magazine

content.rendered:
Regional President and Managing Director Mark Van Drunen shared his insights with Financial Advisor Magazine on lessons he’s learned in his career. “The true measure of success lies not in predicting outcomes but in guiding clients through a journey of financial planning that equips them to navigate the uncertainties that lie ahead,” he shared.

Read the article here.

By clicking on the above link, you will leave MAI’s site and will be directed to a third-party site which MAI does not endorse and is not affiliated.  Some third-party sites require registration or subscription to view content.  Please see MAI’s disclosure page for more information.

excerpt.rendered: Regional President and Managing Director Mark Van Drunen shared his insights with Financial Advisor Magazine on lessons he’s learned in his career.
